Text:
Pilot Talk II is the upcoming fourth studio album and second major label album 
by rapper Curren$y. It has been confirmed that Erykah Badu, Camp Lo and Wu-Tang 
Clan member, Raekwon, will make appearances on the album. Ski Beatz is expected 
to participate in the album production. Curren$y himself stated in an interview 
that the album would be released October 26, 2010.[2] The album has since been 
moved back to November 22, 2010...
